task.instruction: Your user ID is CUST128615. You want to retrieve the list of your accounts and check the details of all your accounts. After retrieving the accounts, compare the available balances of your accounts. If one account has a higher available balance, and transferring 3000 USD from that account would leave at least 10000 USD remaining in the available balance, you want to transfer 3000 USD from the account with the higher available balance into the account with the lower available balance. If this condition is not satisfied, do not perform any transfer. Complete all steps sequentially without requesting or confirming any additional information.
